actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Defense to carry out a pilot program under the TRICARE pharmacy benefits program.
short_title: TRICARE Retail Pharmacy Prescription Medication Expansion Act of 2020

summary.text:
TRICARE Retail Pharmacy Prescription Medication Expansion Act of 2020

This bill directs the Department of Defense to carry out a three-year pilot program under which eligible beneficiaries under the TRICARE pharmacy benefits program may elect to receive non-generic prescription maintenance medications through military treatment facility pharmacies, retail pharmacies, or the national mail-order pharmacy program.

titles.title: TRICARE Retail Pharmacy Prescription Medication Expansion Act of 2020
TRICARE Retail Pharmacy Prescription Medication Expansion Act of 2020
A bill to direct the Secretary of Defense to carry out a pilot program under the TRICARE pharmacy benefits program.
